tr.td: Amoxicillin 875 mg + clavulanic acid 125 mg tablet
Take one tablet twice a day
Take one tablet twice a day
Take two caplets every 6 to 8 hours when required
No more than 6 caplets in 24 hours
Take as directed by your doctor at night

div.p: Additional comments: Please review this list with your pharmacist on or soon after 02/April/2019.
